member.name: M:AddressBook.WebApi.Controllers.AddressController.Get
member.summary: Use to retrive all active address of all contacts

member.name: M:AddressBook.WebApi.Controllers.AddressController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Use to retrive specific address object for the provided Id
member.param: Record of the specific record which has to be retrived
member.returns: Address object for the provided valid record id

member.name: M:AddressBook.WebApi.Controllers.AddressController.GetByContactId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Use to retrive all address associated with the provided contact id, where contact id refers to the record of Contact repository
member.param: Contact record id, which is specified to retrive address associated
member.returns: Array of address object associated to the Contact record

member.name: M:AddressBook.WebApi.Controllers.AddressController.Post(AddressBookBusinessLib.Model.Address)
member.summary: Use to create new Address entry with the provided address model
member.returns: Status OK if success and NOT FOUND when creation failed

member.name: M:AddressBook.WebApi.Controllers.AddressController.Put(System.Int32,AddressBookBusinessLib.Model.Address)
member.summary: Use to update any existing address record
member.param: Address record id, in which the changes has to be updated
Changes encapsulated as an address object
member.returns: Status OK if success and NOT FOUND when update failed

member.name: M:AddressBook.WebApi.Controllers.AddressController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.param: Address record id, which is required to be deleted

member.name: M:AddressBook.WebApi.Controllers.ContactController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get Contact Record for provided record id
member.param: Record of the contact record which has to be reterived
member.returns: Contact record object for the provided id

member.name: M:AddressBook.WebApi.Controllers.ContactController.Post(AddressBookBusinessLib.Model.Contact)
member.summary: Use to save any new Contact entry
member.param: Contact object provided to be created as new entry
member.returns: Status OK when successfully created and Not Found when the creation failed

member.name: M:AddressBook.WebApi.Controllers.ContactController.Put(System.Int32,AddressBookBusinessLib.Model.Contact)
member.summary: Use to update any existing Contact record
member.param: Contact changes encapsulated as contact object which has to be updated
member.returns: Status OK when the update is successful and Not Found when the operation is failed

member.name: M:AddressBook.WebApi.Controllers.ContactController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Use to delete any existing Contact Record
